title: Load specific native libraries on desktop/netfx
body:
**Description of Change**

Load specific native libraries on desktop/netfx

This fixes 2 issues:
- loading multiple versions of libSkiaSharp (#1252)
- resolving the issue with 32/64 bit dll (#713)

Works with https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1347

**Bugs Fixed**

- #1252 
- #713

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

// TODO

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
